products.name: Creme of Nature Argan Oil Intensive Cond. Treatment (20oz)
products.description: The Creme of Nature Argan Oil Intensive Conditioning Treatment is a deep conditioning treatment that restores the natural moisture and sheen of your hair. This product is a leave-in conditioner that contains Moroccan Argan Oil and moisturizing shea butter. It is made to repair damaged hair and restore the health of your hair. This product also has a scent that is reminiscent of the ocean.

products.name: Carotone Black Spot Corrector (B.S.C.) Maxi Effect 30mL
products.description: Carotone Black Spot Corrector (B.S.C.) Maxi Effect  is a new formula that is supposed to help boost collagen production and firm skin. It helps reduce the appearance of dark spots caused by acnes, blemishes and hyperpigmentation.
